summary: Testing completed for new ERP features: HACCP Scheduler, Prima Nota Edit/Delete buttons, F24 Edit/Delete/Overwrite. All 12 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified with all buttons visible and functional.
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during pytest run
context_for_next_testing_agent: New ERP features fully tested. Key endpoints: GET/POST /api/haccp-completo/scheduler/status and /trigger-now, PUT/DELETE /api/prima-nota/cassa/{id}, PUT/DELETE /api/prima-nota/banca/{id}, PUT/DELETE /api/f24-public/models/{id}. Frontend data-testids: edit-movement-{id}, delete-movement-{id}, edit-f24-{id}, delete-f24-{id}, pay-f24-{id}, overwrite-checkbox

HACCP Scheduler Status.details: Returns running=true with job 'haccp_auto_populate' scheduled for 01:00 CET daily

HACCP Scheduler Trigger.details: Successfully triggers auto-population of HACCP data (frigoriferi, congelatori, sanificazioni)

Prima Nota Cassa PUT.details: Updates movement fields (importo, descrizione, categoria, note) correctly

Prima Nota Cassa DELETE.details: Deletes movement and returns 404 on subsequent delete

Prima Nota Banca DELETE.details: Deletes banca movement and returns 404 on subsequent delete

F24 PUT.details: Updates F24 fields (note, banca, contribuente, data_scadenza, pagato)

F24 DELETE.details: Deletes F24 and returns 404 on non-existent

Frontend Prima Nota Buttons.details: Modifica and Elimina buttons visible in AZIONI column for each movement (100+ buttons found)

Frontend F24 Buttons.details: Paga, Modifica, Elimina buttons visible for each F24 record (6 records with 3 buttons each)

Frontend F24 Overwrite Checkbox.details: Checkbox 'Sovrascrivi F24 esistenti con stessa scadenza/importo' visible with data-testid='overwrite-checkbox'

api_endpoints_verified.GET /api/f24-public/models: ✅ Returns {f24s: [...], count: N, totale_da_pagare: N, totale_pagato: N}
